content.rendered:
New Stock: Tangle® Creations

Tangle® is one of America’s best-selling and longest-running impulse toy companies… and we now have some of their most popular products at Gottwals Books. Tangle® is a series of 90-degree curves that pivot at each point, so the possibilities are endless. It can be a puzzle, a movable sculpture, a desktop toy, a fidget, a brain tool, an anti-stress device, or a teacher supply! Tangle® comes in different colors and textures to stimulate sensory as well as motor attention.

Want more information? Check out this video and this website by Tangle® Creations!

 

New Stock: Crocodile Creek

Crocodile Creek® puzzles are also arriving at our stores! Crocodile Creek® is an innovative company committed to creating high-quality products for children. Featuring bright colors and interesting characters, these unique puzzles are perfect for both learning and fun!

 

Summer Reading

We already have many of your required summer reading titles in stock, and we’re ordering more weekly! Students, teachers, and parents… please submit your summer reading list to your closest Gottwals Books store or e-mail to service@gottwalsbooks.com. The earlier we receive the lists the faster we can get your books in stock. You can bet we’ll have the best deals around (including the Internet)!
